name: Alison Barrett on Github
body: ### Howdy. I'm Alison Barrett, known in some places as @aliso or alisothegeek. I'm a WordPress developer. I have a handful of repos here on Github: * [Take Notice](http://aliso.github.io/take-notice/): A WordPress plugin for displaying site-wide messages * [ATG Meta Box](https://github.com/aliso/atg-meta-box): A framework for easily making slick custom meta boxes in WordPress * [VVV Site Wizard](https://github.com/aliso/vvv-site-wizard): A script for automating new site setups in Varying Vagrant Vagrants There are also a few other places I can be found: * [Aliso the Geek](http://alisothegeek.com/): My WordPress development blog * [Aliso the Person](http://blog.alisothegeek.com/): My personal blog * [10up](http://10up.com/): The company I work for * [My WordPress.org profile](http://profiles.wordpress.org/aliso) * [Twitter](http://twitter.com/alisothegeek), [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/alisothegeek), and [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/aliso/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
